name: InitiateUserMigration
description:
Begin the creation of a user migration archive.

This tool is used to initiate the generation of a migration archive for an authenticated GitHub user. Call this when you want to start the process of exporting your data for transfer or backup purposes.

parameters.name: repository_list
parameters.description: A list of repository names to be included in the migration. Expect an array of strings representing repository names.

parameters.name: exclude_attributes
parameters.description: List of attributes to exclude from the API response for better performance.

value_schema.description: Exclude attributes from the API response to improve performance

parameters.name: exclude_attachments
parameters.description: Set to true to exclude attachments from the migration.

value_schema.description: Do not include attachments in the migration

parameters.name: exclude_repository_git_data
parameters.description: Set to true to exclude repository git data from the migration.

value_schema.description: Indicates whether the repository git data should be excluded from the migration.

parameters.name: exclude_metadata
parameters.description: Set to true to exclude metadata and include only git source in the migration.

value_schema.description: Indicates whether metadata should be excluded and only git source should be included for the migration.

parameters.name: exclude_owner_projects
parameters.description: Set to true to exclude projects owned by the organization or users from the migration process.

value_schema.description: Indicates whether projects owned by the organization or users should be excluded.

parameters.name: exclude_releases
parameters.description: Set to true to exclude releases from the migration process.

value_schema.description: Do not include releases in the migration

parameters.name: lock_repositories
parameters.description: Set to true to lock the repositories at the start of the migration.

value_schema.description: Lock the repositories being migrated at the start of the migration

parameters.name: org_metadata_only
parameters.description: Set to true to include only organization metadata. Repositories array will be empty and other flags are ignored.

value_schema.description: Indicates whether this should only include organization metadata (repositories array should be empty and will ignore other flags).

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: Exclude attributes from the API response to improve performance

value_schema.description: Indicates whether projects owned by the organization or users should be excluded.

parameters.name: exclude_releases

value_schema.description: Do not include releases in the migration

parameters.name: lock_repositories
parameters.description: Lock the repositories being migrated at the start of the migration

value_schema.description: Lock the repositories being migrated at the start of the migration

parameters.name: org_metadata_only
parameters.description: Indicates whether this should only include organization metadata (repositories array should be empty and will ignore other flags).

value_schema.description: Indicates whether this should only include organization metadata (repositories array should be empty and will ignore other flags).

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
